plugins.name: hipaa-guardian
plugins.description: HIPAA compliance skill for PHI/PII detection, code scanning, healthcare format support (FHIR/HL7/CDA), auth gate detection, log safety audits, and CI/CD integration. Detects all 18 HIPAA Safe Harbor identifiers.

plugins.name: secret-scanner
plugins.description: Comprehensive secret detection skill. Detects API keys, tokens, passwords, and credentials across 50+ providers (AWS, GCP, Azure, GitHub, Stripe, Slack, OpenAI). Features entropy analysis, git history scanning, and CI/CD integration.
